notesStmt.note: Verso has a few words, in a different hand; Under the heading שנת א׳ת׳כ׳ט׳ לשטרות the calendar lists the day of the week of each New Moon sighting (Molad), holidays and fasts.
Condition: damaged, torn on bottom, losses along right edge.
